shopDescription: A mystical shop in the heart of Mora, offering rare items, potions, and equipment for adventurers.

itemsForSale.itemDescription: A finely crafted bow made by the elves, known for its accuracy and speed.
An armor made from the scales of a dragon, providing exceptional protection.
A powerful elixir that restores mana instantly.
A rare feather from a phoenix, rumored to have healing properties.
